page.title: 16BUCHLYVIE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The school is a focus of life for almost all 5- to 12-year-olds from Buchlyvie and the surrounding farms. {62 pupils}are divided by age between the{3 teachers,}who are helped by part-time specialists for music, remedial work, craft and physical education. During a{typical day,}one child might work at mathematics in his own workbook, write a story in his best handwriting, find out about some past event from books, paint his contribution to a class picture or model, and join his class-mates to learn a new song and watch a schools' television programme. Children either walk home for{lunch,} or eat a cooked or a packed lunch in school. Three tmes a day they{play}in the playground or adjoining swingpark. Most children enjoy school.
